title: #114: Forensically Deconstructing OJ Simpson - The Lost Confession
description:
Our experts Jim Clemente and Laura Richards provide insight and analysis on the interview with OJ Simpson that aired on Fox on March 11. Along with Lisa Zambetti, they forensically deconstruct OJ's 'hypothetical' confession.


#HerNameWasNicole

#HisNameWasRon

You can watch the interview here:

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=ugdTdHiVfYI
